paragraph.paragraph: This page allows you to view the current settings that the wizard will use when generating your new project. Click Finish to accept these settings and generate your new system.
paragraph.heading: 2Modifying your GUI
paragraph.paragraph:
Once you have completed the Advanced GUI Project Wizard, and a system has been generated, you will see that a .BPR file will be displayed in the
0 !DefaultAssociativeIndex Eiffel Solution Explorer>Solution Explorer as the following screenshot demonstrates:

If you double click the .BPR file, the Advanced GUI Project Wizard will be re-opened, allowing you to make changes to the previously generated GUI. You should not modify any Project Items that are displayed in the Build Generated folder, as each time you modify the GUI, the files in this folder will be re-generated, hence over-writing any changes you made.
